Friday 30, July 2021 5pm - 6pm

Lean Tactics for Design Systems

About

Join the 5th edition of the Future of Work 2021 - the world largest remote work trade show. Learn how you, your company and your community can benefit from all the values that flexible work generates. 60+ Speakers, 32 sessions, 4 workshops, networking and virtual expo.

Join the 5th edition of the Future of Work 2021 - the world largest remote work trade show. Learn how you, your company and your community can benefit from all the values that flexible work generates. 60+ Speakers, 32 sessions, 4 workshops, networking and virtual expo.

Agenda:
The importance of design thinking with Dylan Field - CEO of inuit
Case studies
Design systems in the wild with Connie Yang
Follow along workshop - we will be creating out own system

Guest Speakers:
Dylan Field - CEO at Intuit
Connie Yang - Design Leader at Stripe

Sponsors:
Figma https://www.figma.com/
